param.name: refGenomeSource
param.label: Choose the reference genome
param.option: use a genome (fasta format) from history

param.name: index
param.label: Select a built-in reference genome
param.help: This list contains genomes cached at this Galaxy instance. If your genome of interest is not present here request it by using 'Help' link at the top of Galaxy interface or use the 'Use a genome (fasta format) from my history' option of the 'Select Reference Genome' dropdown.

param.name: ownFile
param.label: Using reference file
param.help: This option works best for relatively small genomes. If you are working with large human-sized genomes, send request to Galaxy team for adding your reference to this Galaxy instance by using 'Help' link at the top of Galaxy interface.

param.name: output5_file_check
param.label: Show normal realigned bam
param.help: only if isWriteRealignedBam option is checked
